game.name: NinjaDash
game.description:
Your ninja skill has helped you to take care of the responsibility of defending the sacred statue. Is it not a big task to handle? Join NinjaDash and be prepared to defend the sacred statue against a horde of deadly enemies! You are not alone as a plenty of ninjas will be there with you to throw at your enemies. These life-threating souls will try to put every possible effort to destroy your treasure in the different tatamis in this brand new action-packed challenge. 
They are good in number and will keep coming until all are finished. Your primary job in this HTML5 fighting game is to kill the most dangerous bosses before they approach. You cannot sit back for a single moment till your enemies are alive. Fight like an ultimate warrior ninja and tell your enemies that they have met with the wrong person this time! Be careful and try to be attentive all the time since these bloody bad souls can come to you from any direction!
People of your country believe on your skill so do not let the sacred statue snatch from you. Combined with the spectacular design, fast and fun gameplay and intuitive and easy to play controls, this new ninja fighting game is sure to bring you the entertainment of hours. If you want to play more games like that, do not forget to browse through our extensive world of free action games to allow you get the break from the hectic and stressful life routine.
